articles.title: Anthropic says most AI models, not just Claude, will resort to blackmail
articles.titleJa: Anthropic 述べる 最も AI models, not ちょうど Claude, will resort にblackmail
articles.summary: Several weeks after Anthropic released research claiming that its Claude Opus 4 AI model resorted to blackmailing engineers who tried to turn the model off in controlled test scenarios, the company is out with new research suggesting the problem is more widespread among leading AI models.
articles.summaryJa: いくつかの weeks after Anthropic released 研究 claiming そのそのClaude 4Opus 4 AI モデル resorted にblackmailing engineers 誰が試行した にturn モデル off で制御した テスト scenarios, 会社 is out と新しい 研究 suggesting 問題 is より多い widespread among leading AI models.

articles.title: Unlock the other 99% of your data – now ready for AI
articles.titleJa: Unlock 他の 99% のyour データ – 今 準備ができている のためのAI
articles.summary: For decades, companies of all sizes have recognized that the data available to them holds significant value, for improving user and customer experiences and for developing strategic plans based on empirical evidence.
articles.summaryJa: のためのdecades, companies のすべての sizes have 認識した そのデータ 利用可能な にthem 保持 significant 価値, のためのimproving ユーザー と顧客 experiences とのためのdeveloping strategic plans based でempirical 証拠.

articles.title: UC Berkeley Introduces CyberGym: A Real-World Cybersecurity Evaluation Framework to Evaluate AI Agents on Large-Scale Vulnerabilities Across Massive Codebases
articles.titleJa: UC Berkeley 導入 CyberGym: 実際の-世界 Cybersecurity Evaluation フレームワーク にEvaluate AI Agents で大きい-Scale Vulnerabilities Across 大規模な Codebases
articles.summary: Cybersecurity has become a significant area of interest in artificial intelligence, driven by the increasing reliance on large software systems and the expanding capabilities of AI tools.
articles.summaryJa: Cybersecurity has になる significant エリア のinterest で人工の intelligence, driven によってincreasing reliance で大きい ソフトウェア systems とexpanding capabilities のAI tools.

articles.title: From Backend Automation to Frontend Collaboration: What’s New in AG-UI Latest Update for AI Agent-User Interaction
articles.titleJa: からBackend オートメーション にFrontend 連携: What’s 新しい でAG-UI 最新の Update のためのAIエージェント-ユーザー Interaction
articles.summary: Introduction AI agents are increasingly moving from pure backend automators to visible, collaborative elements within modern applications. However, making agents genuinely interactive—capable of both responding to users and proactively guiding workflows—has long been an engineering headache.
articles.summaryJa: Introduction AI agents are increasingly moving からpure backend automators に見える, collaborative elements within モダンな applications. しかし, making agents genuinely interactive—capable のboth responding にusers とproactively guiding workflows—has 長い been engineering headache.

articles.title: Beyond Model Stacking: The Architecture Principles That Make Multimodal AI Systems Work
articles.titleJa: Beyond モデル Stacking: アーキテクチャ Principles その作成 マルチモーダル AI Systems 機能

articles.summaryJa: Transforming Independent Models into Collaborative Intelligence post Beyond モデル Stacking: アーキテクチャ Principles その作成 マルチモーダル AI Systems 機能 現れた first でTowards データ Science.

articles.title: LLM-as-a-Judge: A Practical Guide
articles.titleJa: LLM-as-a-Judge: Practical Guide

articles.summaryJa: どのようににScale LLM Evaluations Beyond Manual Review post LLM-as-a-Judge: Practical Guide 現れた first でTowards データ Science.

articles.title: From Configuration to Orchestration: Building an ETL Workflow with AWS Is No Longer a Struggle
articles.titleJa: からConfiguration にOrchestration: Building ETL Workflow とAWS Is No より長く Struggle
articles.summary: A step-by-step guide to leverage AWS services for efficient data pipeline automation The post From Configuration to Orchestration: Building an ETL Workflow with AWS Is No Longer a Struggle appeared first on Towards Data Science.
articles.summaryJa: ステップ-by-ステップ guide にleverage AWS services のための効率的な データ pipeline オートメーション post からConfiguration にOrchestration: Building ETL Workflow とAWS Is No より長く Struggle 現れた first でTowards データ Science.

articles.title: Apple hints at AI integration in chip design process
articles.titleJa: Apple hints でAI integration でchip デザイン プロセス
articles.summary: Apple is beginning to use generative artificial intelligence to help design the chips that power its devices. The company s hardware chief, Johny Srouji, made that clear during a speech last month in Belgium.
articles.summaryJa: Apple is beginning に使用 generative 人工の intelligence に支援 デザイン chips そのpower そのdevices. 会社 s ハードウェア chief, Johny Srouji, 作成した その明確な during スピーチ 最後 月 でBelgium.

articles.title: Beyond Code Generation: Continuously Evolve Text with LLMs
articles.titleJa: Beyond Code 世代: 継続的に Evolve Text とLLMs
articles.summary: Long-running content evolution and an introduction to result analysis The post Beyond Code Generation: Continuously Evolve Text with LLMs appeared first on Towards Data Science.
articles.summaryJa: 長い-実行中 コンテンツ evolution とintroduction に結果 analysis post Beyond Code 世代: 継続的に Evolve Text とLLMs 現れた first でTowards データ Science.

articles.title: Amazon Rebuilt Alexa Using a ‘Staggering’ Amount of AI Tools
articles.titleJa: Amazon Rebuilt Alexa Using ‘Staggering’ Amount のAI Tools
articles.summary: From writing code to testing the new Alexa+, Amazon engineers used generative AI throughout the build process. We talk to Amazon's Daniel Rausch about the next version of the voice assistant.
articles.summaryJa: からwriting code にtesting 新しい Alexa+, Amazon engineers 使用した 生成AI throughout 構築 プロセス. We 話す にAmazon's Daniel Rausch 約 next version の声 assistant.

articles.title: Hugging Face partners with Groq for ultra-fast AI model inference
articles.titleJa: Hugging 面 partners とGroq のためのultra-高速な AI モデル inference
articles.summary: Hugging Face has added Groq to its AI model inference providers, bringing lightning-fast processing to the popular model hub. Speed and efficiency have become increasingly crucial in AI development, with many organisations struggling to balance model performance against rising computational costs.
articles.summaryJa: Hugging 面 has added Groq にそのAI モデル inference providers, bringing 稲妻-高速な processing に人気の モデル hub. Speed と効率 have になる increasingly crucial でAI 発展, と多くの organisations struggling にbalance モデル 性能 against rising computational costs.

articles.title: Seriously, What Is ‘Superintelligence’?
articles.titleJa: Seriously, 何をIs ‘Superintelligence’?
articles.summary: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we talk about Meta’s recent investment in Scale AI and its move to build a superintelligence AI research lab. So we ask: What is superintelligence anyway.
articles.summaryJa: でこのepisode のUncanny Valley, we 話す 約 Meta’s 最近の 投資 でScale AI とその移動 に構築 superintelligence AI 研究 lab. そのため we 尋ねる: 何をis superintelligence anyway.

articles.title: Toward understanding and preventing misalignment generalization
articles.titleJa: Toward understanding とpreventing misalignment generalization
articles.summary: We study how training on incorrect responses can cause broader misalignment in language models and identify an internal feature driving this behavior—one that can be reversed with minimal fine-tuning.
articles.summaryJa: We 研究 どのように訓練 で間違った responses can cause broader misalignment でlanguage models とidentify internal feature driving このbehavior—one そのできる reversed とminimal ファインチューニング.

articles.title: Hospital cyber attacks cost $600K/hour. Here’s how AI is changing the math
articles.titleJa: Hospital cyber attacks コスト $600K/時間. Here’s どのようにAI is changing math
articles.summary: How Alberta Health Services is using advanced AI to bolster its defenses as attackers increasingly target healthcare facilities.
articles.summaryJa: どのようにAlberta 健康 Services is using 高度な AI にbolster そのdefenses としてattackers increasingly target ヘルスケア facilities.

articles.title: Fault Tolerant Llama: training with 2000 synthetic failures every ~15 seconds and no checkpoints on Crusoe L40S
articles.titleJa: Fault Tolerant Llama: 訓練 と2000 synthetic failures every ~15 seconds とno checkpoints でCrusoe L40S
articles.summary: Collaborators: Less Wright, Howard Huang, Chien-Chin Huang, Crusoe: Martin Cala, Ethan Petersen tl;dr: we used torchft and torchtitan to train a model in a real-world environment with extreme synthetic failure.
articles.summaryJa: Collaborators: より少ない Wright, Howard Huang, Chien-Chin Huang, Crusoe: Martin Cala, Ethan Petersen tl;dr: we 使用した torchft とtorchtitan にtrain モデル で実際の-世界 環境 とextreme synthetic failure.

articles.title: After trying to buy Ilya Sutskever’s $32B AI startup, Meta looks to hire its CEO
articles.titleJa: After trying にbuy Ilya Sutskever’s $32B AI スタートアップ, Meta 見える にhire そのCEO
articles.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg tried to acquire Ilya Sutskever's $32B AI startup, but failed, so now he's in talks to hire its CEO, Daniel Gross.
articles.summaryJa: Meta CEO マーク Zuckerberg 試行した にacquire Ilya Sutskever's $32B AI スタートアップ, しかし failed, そのため 今 he's で話す にhire そのCEO, Daniel Gross.

articles.title: Beyond GridSearchCV: Advanced Hyperparameter Tuning Strategies for Scikit-learn Models
articles.titleJa: Beyond GridSearchCV: 高度な Hyperparameter Tuning Strategies のためのScikit-学習 Models
articles.summary: Ever felt like trying to find a needle in a haystack. That’s part of the process of building and optimizing machine learning models, particularly complex ones like ensembles and neural networks, where several hyperparameters need to be manually set by us before training them.
articles.summaryJa: Ever 感じた 好む trying に発見 needle でhaystack. That’s 部分 のプロセス のbuilding とoptimizing 機械 学習 models, particularly 複雑な ones 好む ensembles とニューラルネットワーク, どこでいくつかの hyperparameters 必要 にbe manually 設定 によってus before 訓練 them.

articles.title: Top 5 Frameworks for Distributed Machine Learning
articles.titleJa: 上 5 Frameworks のためのDistributed 機械 学習
articles.summary: Use these frameworks to optimize memory and compute resources, scale your machine learning workflow, speed up your processes, and reduce the overall cost.
articles.summaryJa: 使用 these frameworks にoptimize memory とcompute resources, scale your 機械 学習 workflow, speed up your processes, と削減 全体的な コスト.

articles.title: A Gentle Introduction to Multi-Head Attention and Grouped-Query Attention
articles.titleJa: 優しい Introduction にMulti-頭 Attention とGrouped-Query Attention
articles.summary: This post is divided into three parts; they are: • Why Attention is Needed • The Attention Operation • Multi-Head Attention (MHA) • Grouped-Query Attention (GQA) and Multi-Query Attention (MQA) Traditional neural networks struggle with long-range dependencies in sequences.
articles.summaryJa: このpost is divided into three parts; they are: • なぜAttention is 必要だった • Attention 運営 • Multi-頭 Attention (MHA) • Grouped-Query Attention (GQA) とMulti-Query Attention (MQA) 伝統的な ニューラルネットワーク struggle と長い-範囲 dependencies でsequences.

articles.title: 10 Must-Know Python Libraries for MLOps in 2025
articles.titleJa: 10 Must-知る Python Libraries のためのMLOps で2025
articles.summary: MLOps, or machine learning operations, is all about managing the end-to-end process of building, training, deploying, and maintaining machine learning models.
articles.summaryJa: MLOps, または機械 学習 operations, is すべての 約 managing 終了-to-終了 プロセス のbuilding, 訓練, deploying, とmaintaining 機械 学習 models.

articles.title: Is this the electric grid of the future?
articles.titleJa: Is このelectric grid の将来の?
articles.summary: One morning in the middle of March, a slow-moving spring blizzard stalled above eastern Nebraska, pounding the state capital of Lincoln with 60-mile-per-hour winds, driving sleet, and up to eight inches of snow.
articles.summaryJa: One morning で中央 のMarch, 遅い-moving spring blizzard stalled above eastern Nebraska, pounding 状態 capital のLincoln と60-mile-per-時間 winds, driving sleet, とup にeight inches の雪.

articles.title: (LoRA) Fine-Tuning FLUX.1-dev on Consumer Hardware
articles.titleJa: (LoRA) ファインチューニング FLUX.1-dev でConsumer ハードウェア
articles.summary: (LoRA) Fine-Tuning FLUX. 1-dev on Consumer Hardware.
articles.summaryJa: (LoRA) ファインチューニング FLUX. 1-dev でConsumer ハードウェア.

articles.title: This AI Model Never Stops Learning
articles.titleJa: このAI モデル 決して 停止 学習
articles.summary: Scientists at Massachusetts Institute of Technology have devised a way for large language models to keep learning on the fly—a step toward building AI that continually improves itself.
articles.summaryJa: Scientists でMassachusetts Institute の技術 have devised 方法 のための大きい language models に保つ 学習 でfly—ステップ toward building AI その継続的に 改善 itself.

articles.title: Authors Are Posting TikToks to Protest AI Use in Writing—and to Prove They Aren’t Doing It
articles.titleJa: Authors Are Posting TikToks にProtest AI 使用 でWriting—とにProve They Aren’t Doing It
articles.summary: Traditional and indie authors are flooding #WritersTok with videos of them editing their manuscripts to refute accusations of generative AI use—and bring readers into their very human process.
articles.summaryJa: 伝統的な とindie authors are flooding #WritersTok とvideos のthem editing それらのmanuscripts にrefute accusations の生成AI 使用—と持参 readers into それらの非常に 人間 プロセス.

articles.title: A Practical Guide to Multimodal Data Analytics
articles.titleJa: Practical Guide にマルチモーダル データ Analytics
articles.summary: BigQuery's ObjectRef unifies structured and unstructured data, enabling multimodal analytics via SQL and Python.
articles.summaryJa: BigQuery's ObjectRef unifies 構造化された とunstructured データ, enabling マルチモーダル analytics via SQL とPython.

articles.title: DeepNVMe: Affordable I/O scaling for Deep Learning Applications
articles.titleJa: DeepNVMe: Affordable I/O scaling のための深い 学習 Applications
articles.summary: Introduction We introduced DeepNVMe in summer 2024 as a suite of optimizations for tackling I/O bottlenecks in Deep Learning (DL). DeepNVMe delivers significant speedups for I/O bound DL workloads by leveraging storage.
articles.summaryJa: Introduction We introduced DeepNVMe でsummer 2024 としてsuite のoptimizations のためのtackling I/O bottlenecks で深い 学習 (DL). DeepNVMe 配信 significant speedups のためのI/O bound DL workloads によってleveraging storage.

articles.title: How to Combine Scikit-learn, CatBoost, and SHAP for Explainable Tree Models
articles.titleJa: どのようににCombine Scikit-学習, CatBoost, とSHAP のためのExplainable Tree Models
articles.summary: Machine learning workflows often involve a delicate balance: you want models that perform exceptionally well, but you also need to understand and explain their predictions.
articles.summaryJa: 機械 学習 workflows しばしば involve 繊細な balance: you 望む models そのperform exceptionally 良い, しかし you また 必要 にunderstand とexplain それらのpredictions.

articles.title: Positional Encodings in Transformer Models
articles.titleJa: Positional Encodings でTransformer Models

articles.title: ParetoQ: Scaling Laws in Extremely Low-bit LLM Quantization
articles.titleJa: ParetoQ: Scaling Laws で極めて 低い-ビット LLM Quantization
articles.summary: The field of large language models is shifting toward lower-precision computation. This shift necessitates a rethinking of scaling laws to account for the effects of quantization on resulting quantized model.
articles.summaryJa: フィールド の大きい language models is shifting toward より低く-precision computation. このshift necessitates rethinking のscaling laws にアカウント のためのeffects のquantization でresulting quantized モデル.

articles.title: Build Responsible AI Products with your own Yellow Teaming LLM
articles.titleJa: 構築 Responsible AI Products とyour own Yellow Teaming LLM
articles.summary: The tools we use to build AI are evolving fast, with PyTorch at the heart of many advances. But unless we evolve the way we approach building AI systems, we.
articles.summaryJa: tools we 使用 に構築 AI are evolving 高速な, とPyTorch で心 の多くの advances. しかし unless we evolve 方法 we アプローチ building AI systems, we.

articles.title: Understanding Convolutions on Graphs
articles.titleJa: Understanding Convolutions でGraphs
articles.summary: Understanding the building blocks and design choices of graph neural networks.
articles.summaryJa: Understanding building blocks とデザイン choices のgraph ニューラルネットワーク.

articles.title: A Gentle Introduction to Graph Neural Networks
articles.titleJa: 優しい Introduction にGraph ニューラルネットワーク
articles.summary: What components are needed for building learning algorithms that leverage the structure and properties of graphs.
articles.summaryJa: 何をcomponents are 必要だった のためのbuilding 学習 algorithms そのleverage 構造 とproperties のgraphs.

articles.title: Branch Specialization
articles.titleJa: Branch Specialization
articles.summary: When a neural network layer is divided into multiple branches, neurons self-organize into coherent groupings.
articles.summaryJa: いつニューラルネットワーク layer is divided into 複数の branches, neurons self-organize into coherent groupings.

articles.title: Multimodal Neurons in Artificial Neural Networks
articles.titleJa: マルチモーダル Neurons で人工の ニューラルネットワーク
articles.summary: We report the existence of multimodal neurons in artificial neural networks, similar to those found in the human brain.
articles.summaryJa: We report 存在 のマルチモーダル neurons で人工の ニューラルネットワーク, 似ている にthose 発見した で人間 脳.
